Class BilliardTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • Classes.BilliardTable

  • public class BilliardTable
extends java.lang.Object
    The BilliardTable class represents the billiard table.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Lennart B

    • Method Summary

      Draws the billiard table on the screen

      Gets the bounds of the table
